CN.content:

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: 7 Figure 3 shows the external quantum efficiency ( EQE ) curve of the device with the PBDT-TDPP-S : PC71BM blend.

Let's think step by step.

In the given paragraph, the following are the "Property Name" entities:

1. EQE: External Quantum Efficiency
2. PBDT: P-Type Bottom-Contact Doped Tunneling
3. TDPP: Tunneling Doped P-Type Polymer
4. PC71BM: Polymer-Coated 71BM

These are the names of the properties or entities being referred to in the paragraph.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

Sure! Here are the relevant entities in the paragraph that refer to material properties:

1. EQE: External Quantum Efficiency
2. PC71BM: Polymer-Coated 71BM

These are the material properties being referred to in the paragraph.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid entities in the paragraph that refer to material properties, presented in a Markdown table with one column "Property Name":

| Property Name |
| --- |
| EQE | External Quantum Efficiency |
| PC71BM | Polymer-Coated 71BM |

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: 7 Figure 3 shows the external quantum efficiency ( EQE ) curve of the device with the PBDT-TDPP-S : PC71BM blend.

Let's think step by step.

In the given paragraph, the following entities can be identified as "Property Value" entities:

1. EQE (External Quantum Efficiency) - This is a measure of the efficiency of the solar cell in converting incoming photons into electrical current.
2. PBDT-TDPP-S - This is a type of organic semiconductor material used in the blend.
3. PC71BM - This is another type of organic semiconductor material used in the blend.

Therefore, the Property Value entities in the paragraph are:

1. EQE
2. PBDT-TDPP-S
3. PC71BM
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

Sure, here are the entities that refer to the value of material properties in the paragraph:

1. EQE (External Quantum Efficiency) - This is a measure of the efficiency of the solar cell in converting incoming photons into electrical current.

Therefore, the only entity that refers to a value of material property in the paragraph is:

1. EQE

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid entities in the paragraph that refer to material property values, presented in a Markdown table:

| Property Value |
| --- |
| EQE (External Quantum Efficiency) |

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.
